original_text: Also, Manasseh murdered many people who had not done anything wrong. Their blood was in all the streets of Jerusalem! He caused the people in Judah to do bad things too. He caused them to do things that the Lord said were evil.
korean_text: 므낫세가 유다에게 범죄하게 하여 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행한 것 외에도 또 무죄한 자의 피를 심히 많이 흘려 예루살렘 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 가득하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: who had not done anything wrong
Their blood was in all the streets of Jerusalem!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 피가 예루살렘의 모든 거리에 있었다!

sentences.original_text: He caused the people in Judah to do bad things too
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유다 백성들도 나쁜 일을 하게 만들었다

sentences.original_text: He caused them to do things
that the Lord said were evil
